select aa.*,bb.*,cc.orderpaytime,cc.exchange_rate from (select od.orderid,od.yourorder,od.goodsprice,od.state,od.purchase_state,ifnull(od.re_shipnos,od.shipno) as od_shipno, ifnull(ops.last_tb_1688_itemid,ops.tb_1688_itemid) as od_pid from order_details od left join order_product_source ops on ops.orderid = od.orderid and ops.od_id = od.id and od.state in(0,1) where od.orderid in(select order_no from orderinfo_curren_monthly) ) aa left join (select distinct th.orderid as tb_orderid,th.shipno,th.itemurl,th.itemid,th.itemqty as itemqty,th.totalprice,th.orderdate from (select od.orderid,od.id as od_id,od.yourorder,od.goodsprice,od.state as od_state, od.purchase_state,od.shipno as od_shipno, ifnull(ops.last_tb_1688_itemid,ops.tb_1688_itemid) as od_pid from order_details od left join order_product_source ops on ops.orderid = od.orderid and ops.od_id = od.id and od.state in(0,1) where od.orderid in(select order_no from orderinfo_curren_monthly)) odp left join taobao_1688_order_history th on odp.od_shipno = th.shipno and odp.od_pid = th.itemid where th.shipno is not null group by th.shipno,th.itemid) bb on aa.od_shipno = bb.shipno and aa.od_pid = bb.itemid inner join orderinfo cc on aa.orderid = cc.order_no and cc.user_id in(select id from user where is_test = 0) order by aa.orderid,bb.orderdate desc
limit #{startNum},#{limitNum}

select aa.*,bb.* from (select distinct th.orderid as tb_orderid,th.shipno,th.itemurl,th.itemid,th.itemqty as itemqty,th.totalprice, th.paydata as orderdate from taobao_1688_order_history th where th.paydata between #{beginTime} and #{endTime} and th.tbOr1688 between 0 and 3 group by th.shipno,th.itemid) bb left join (select od.orderid,od.yourorder,od.goodsprice,od.state,od.purchase_state,ifnull(od.re_shipnos,od.shipno) as od_shipno, ifnull(ops.last_tb_1688_itemid,ops.tb_1688_itemid) as od_pid,oi.orderpaytime,oi.exchange_rate from order_details od left join order_product_source ops on ops.orderid = od.orderid and ops.od_id = od.id and od.state in(0,1) inner join orderinfo oi on od.orderid = oi.order_no and oi.user_id in(select id from user where is_test = 0) where od.orderid in(select order_no from orderinfo_curren_monthly) ) aa on aa.od_shipno = bb.shipno and aa.od_pid = bb.itemid order by bb.orderdate desc
limit #{startNum},#{limitNum}
